cards.name: Spawning Pool
cards.text:
Spawning Pool enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}: Spawning Pool becomes a 1/1 black Skeleton creature with "{B}: Regenerate this creature" until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it regenerates, the next time it would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

Activating the ability that turns it into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to a specific number. However, any effect that raises or lowers power and/or toughness (such as the effect created by Giant Growth, Glorious Anthem, or a +1/+1 counter) will continue to apply.

cards.name: Spellbook
cards.text: You have no maximum hand size.
cards.flavor:
"Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again."
—Karn, silver golem

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Spellbook onto the battlefield, you’ll have no maximum hand size. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

foreignNames.name: Schleichender Tiger
foreignNames.text: Der Schleichende Tiger kann nicht von mehr als einer Kreatur geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: Im Dschungel von Jamuraa kann man oft Schönheit und Gefahr nicht unterscheiden.

foreignNames.name: Tigre al acecho
foreignNames.text: El Tigre al acecho no puede ser bloqueado por más de una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: En las selvas de Jamuraa, normalmente no hay diferencia entre belleza y peligro.

foreignNames.name: Tigre en chasse
foreignNames.text: Le Tigre en chasse ne peut pas être bloqué par plus d'une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans les jungles djamùraanes, il n'y a pas beaucoup de différence entre la beauté et le danger.

foreignNames.name: Tigre in Agguato
foreignNames.text: La Tigre in Agguato non può essere bloccata da più di una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Nella Giungla di Jamuraa, spesso è impossibile separare il pericolo dalla bellezza.

foreignNames.name: 忍び寄る虎
foreignNames.text: 忍び寄る虎は、２体以上のクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: ジャムーラのジャングルでは、美と危険は往々にして区別できない。

foreignNames.name: Tigre Caçador
foreignNames.text: Tigre Caçador não pode ser bloqueado por mais do que uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Nas selvas de Jamuraa, geralmente não há distinção entre beleza e perigo.

foreignNames.name: Крадущийся Тигр
foreignNames.text: Крадущийся Тигр не может быть заблокирован более чем одним существом.
foreignNames.flavor: В Джамуранских джунглях красоту не всегда можно отличить от опасности.

foreignNames.name: 潜行之虎
foreignNames.text: 潜行之虎不能被一个以上的生物阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 在杰姆拉丛林中，美丽与危险经常集于一体。

cards.originalText: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Stampeding Wildebeests
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: The ability that returns a creature doesn’t target anything. You can return a creature with shroud or protection from green, for example. You don’t decide which creature to return until the ability resolves. If you control no other green creatures, you must return Stampeding Wildebeests itself.
You choose a creature and return it all during resolution of the triggered ability. This means that if you have two Wildebeests, there is no way to end up returning only one creature.

foreignNames.name: Wütende Wildebeests
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden (Falls diese Kreatur ihren Blockern genug Schaden zufügen würde, um sie zu zerstören, kannst du sie den Rest des Schadens dem verteidigenden Spieler zufügen lassen.)
Bringe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine grüne Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die gewaltigsten und zerstörerischsten Stürme in Femeref treten an Tagen auf, an denen der Himmel wolkenlos ist.

foreignNames.name: Estampida de fauna salvaje
foreignNames.text:
Arrolla. (Si esta criatura fuera a hacer suficiente daño de combate a sus bloqueadores como para destruirlos, puedes hacer que le haga el resto del daño al jugador defensor.)
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, regresa una criatura verde que controles a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Las tormentas más violentas y destructivas en Femeref ocurren los días despejados.

foreignNames.name: Ruée de gnous
foreignNames.text:
Piétinement (Si cette créature inflige suffisamment de blessures de combat à ses bloqueurs pour les détruire, vous pouvez faire qu'elle inflige le reste de ses blessures au joueur défenseur.)
Au début de votre entretien, renvoyez une créature verte que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Les tempêtes les plus violentes et les plus destructrices de Fémeiref ont lieu par des journées sans nuages.

foreignNames.name: Carica di Gnu
foreignNames.text:
Travolgere (Se questa creatura sta per infliggere alle sue creature bloccanti danno da combattimento sufficiente a distruggerle, puoi farle infliggere il resto del suo danno al giocatore in difesa.)
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, fai tornare una creatura verde che controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Nel Femeref, le tempeste più violente e distruttive si scatenano nei giorni più limpidi.

foreignNames.name: 暴走するヌー
foreignNames.text:
トランプル （このクリーチャーが、自身をブロックしているすべてのクリーチャーを破壊するのに十分な戦闘ダメージを与える場合、あなたはそれの残りのダメージを防御プレイヤーに与えてもよい。）
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがコントロールする緑のクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: フェメレフで最も暴力的で破壊的な嵐は、雲一つ無い日に巻き起こる。

foreignNames.name: Estouro de Gnus
foreignNames.text:
Atropelar (Se esta criatura fosse causar dano de combate suficiente para destruir seus bloqueadores, você pode fazer com que ela cause o resto de seu dano ao jogador defensor.)
No início de sua manutenção, devolva uma criatura verde que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: As tempestades mais violentas e destrutivas de Femeref acontecem nos dias de céu claro.

foreignNames.name: Табун Гну
foreignNames.text:
Пробивной удар (Если это существо нанесло достаточно боевых повреждений, чтобы уничтожить блокирующие его существа, вы можете нанести оставшиеся повреждения защищающемуся игроку.)
В начале вашего шага поддержки верните зеленое существо под вашим контролем в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Самые яростные и разрушительные бури в Фемерефе бывают в безоблачную погоду.

foreignNames.name: 狂奔的兽群
foreignNames.text:
践踏（若此生物将造成的战斗伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以使它对防御牌手造成所剩余数量的伤害。）
在你的维持开始时，将一个由你操控的绿色生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 费米瑞甫最劲猛的风暴是发生在无云的日子。

cards.originalText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Stampeding Wildebeests
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: The most violent and destructive storms in Femeref occur on cloudless days.

rulings.text: The ability that returns a creature doesn’t target anything. You can return a creature with shroud or protection from green, for example. You don’t decide which creature to return until the ability resolves. If you control no other green creatures, you must return Stampeding Wildebeests itself.
You choose a creature and return it all during resolution of the triggered ability. This means that if you have two Wildebeests, there is no way to end up returning only one creature.

cards.name: Starlight Invoker
cards.text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
cards.flavor: "The constellations form a tapestry of light that traces my people's broken history. Day and night, I feel their glittering presence calling me to weave the pattern whole."

foreignNames.name: Sternenlicht-Beschwörer
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}: Du erhältst 5 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Sternbilder erzeugen einen Teppich aus Licht, auf dem man Teile der Geschichte meines Volkes lesen kann. Tag und Nacht spüre ich, wie ihr Leuchten nach mir ruft, das Muster fertig zu weben."

foreignNames.name: Invocadora de luz estelar
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}: Ganas 5 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Las constelaciones forman un tapiz de luz que rastrea la historia fracturada de mi gente. Noche y día, siento su brillante presencia pidiéndome que complete el tejido."

foreignNames.name: Invocatrice de lumière d'étoile
foreignNames.text: {7}{W} : Vous gagnez 5 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les constellations forment une tapisserie de lumière qui retrace l'histoire brisée de mon peuple. Nuit et jour, je sens cette présence scintillante m'appeler pour finir de la tisser. »

foreignNames.name: Evocatore di Luce Stellare
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}: Guadagni 5 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "Le costellazioni formano un tappeto di luce che ripercorre la storia frammentata del mio popolo. Giorno e notte, sento la loro presenza scintillante che mi chiama per tessere l'intera trama."

foreignNames.name: 星明かりの発動者
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}：あなたは5点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 星座は我が一族の壊れた歴史を追う光のタペストリーを成します。 日毎夜毎、私にはその模様を編み上げるよう求める輝く存在を感じるのです。

foreignNames.name: Invocadora da Luz das Estrelas
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}: Você ganha 5 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "As constelações formam um tapete de luzes que traçam a história despedaçada do meu povo. Dia e noite eu sinto a sua presença cintilante me chamando para completar a trama."

foreignNames.name: Призывательница Звездного Света
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}: Вы получаете 5 жизней.
foreignNames.flavor: "Созвездия образуют ткань из света, в которой прослеживаются отрывки из истории моего народа. И днем и ночью я чувствую их притягивающее мерцание, напоминающее, чтобы я сплела эту ткань воедино".

foreignNames.name: 星光召现师
foreignNames.text: {7}{W}：你获得5点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「星光交织而成的星座图，让我能追寻族人的破碎历史。 那闪烁光芒不分昼夜地召唤着，要我快将图样补齐。」

cards.originalText: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.

cards.name: Steadfast Guard
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: "Best leave your tongue in its yap-hole, Mercadian scum, for your silvered words and golden bribes do not sparkle so brightly outside your city."

foreignNames.name: Standhafte Wache
foreignNames.text: Wachsamkeit (Diese Kreatur wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Halt einfach dein Maul, merkadischer Abschaum. Deine silbernen Worte und goldenes Schmiergeld glitzern außerhalb deiner Stadt nicht so hell."

foreignNames.name: Guardia resuelto
foreignNames.text: Vigilancia. (Esta criatura no se gira al atacar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Mejor deja tu lengua en ese agujero, basura de Mercadia, porque tus palabras de plata y tus sobornos de oro no brillan tanto fuera de tu ciudad."

foreignNames.name: Garde inébranlable
foreignNames.text: Vigilance (Attaquer avec cette créature ne la fait pas s'engager.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Mieux vaut fermer ton clapet, fumier de mercadien. Tes belles paroles et ton or perdent de leur éclat en dehors de ta cité. »

foreignNames.name: Guardia Risoluta
foreignNames.text: Cautela (Attacca senza TAPpare.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Meglio che chiudi la tua ciabatta, feccia di Mercadia, perché le tue parole argentee e le bustarelle dorate non luccicano poi tanto fuori dalla tua città."

foreignNames.name: 不動の守備兵
foreignNames.text: 警戒 （このクリーチャーは攻撃してもタップしない。）
foreignNames.flavor: お前の舌はそのお喋り穴にしまっとけ、メルカディア野郎。銀色の甘言だの金色の賄賂だのは、都市の外に出たらそんなに光りゃしないんだぞ。

foreignNames.name: Guarda Ferrenha
foreignNames.text: Vigilância (Esta criatura não é virada para atacar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Melhor deixar sua língua na toca, gentalha de Mercádia, pois suas palavras prateadas e seus subornos dourados não têm tanto brilho fora de sua cidade."

foreignNames.name: Непоколебимый Страж
foreignNames.text: Бдительность (При нападении это существо не поворачивается.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Лучше заткните глотки, меркадианская мразь Ваши золотые обещания и дорогие посулы тускнеют в чужом краю".

foreignNames.name: 坚定的护卫
foreignNames.text: 警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「玛凯迪亚败类，最好把舌头塞回狗嘴里。你的白银巧言与黄金贿赂一出了城，就没你以为的那么闪亮。」

cards.originalText: Vigilance

cards.name: Steadfast Guard
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: "Best leave your tongue in its yap-hole, Mercadian scum, for your silvered words and golden bribes do not sparkle so brightly outside your city."

cards.name: Steel Golem
cards.text: You can't cast creature spells.
cards.flavor:
"Once you create perfection, what else is there to make?"
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

rulings.text: You can put creatures onto the battlefield by means other than casting them.
Yes, this only affects you.
A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

foreignNames.name: Stahlgolem
foreignNames.text: Du kannst keine Kreaturenzauber spielen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sobald man Perfektion erschaffen hat, was hat man dann noch für ein Ziel?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevischer Maschinist

foreignNames.name: Gólem de acero
foreignNames.text: No puedes jugar hechizos de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "¿Una vez que has creado la perfección, qué te queda por hacer?" —Arcum Dagsson, mecánico soldevi

foreignNames.name: Golem d'acier
foreignNames.text: Vous ne pouvez pas jouer de sorts de créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Une fois que vous avez créé la perfection, que vous reste-t-il à accomplir ? » —Arcum Dagsson, machiniste soldevi

foreignNames.name: Golem d'Argento
foreignNames.text: Non puoi giocare magie creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Una volta creata la perfezione, cos'altro c'è da fare?" —Arcum Dagsson, macchinista di Soldevi

foreignNames.name: 鋼のゴーレム
foreignNames.text: あなたはクリーチャー呪文をプレイできない。
foreignNames.flavor: 完璧を作り上げたら、もう作るものなどあるのかね？ ――ソルデヴィの機械魔術師、アーカム・ダグスン

foreignNames.name: Golem de Aço
foreignNames.text: Você não pode jogar mágicas de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Uma vez que você cria a perfeição, o que resta a ser feito?" — Arcum Dagsson, maquinista soldeviano

foreignNames.name: Стальной Голем
foreignNames.text: Вы не можете разыгрывать заклинания существ.
foreignNames.flavor: "После того, как ты сотворил само совершенство, чего ещё можно достичь?" — Аркум Дагссон, сольдевский механик

foreignNames.name: 钢铁魔像
foreignNames.text: 你不能使用生物咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「造出完美之后，你还能作些什么？」 ～索地威工匠阿肯·达格森

cards.originalText: You can't play creature spells.

cards.name: Story Circle
cards.text:
As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

foreignNames.name: Sagenkreis
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eine Farbe, sowie der Sagenkreis ins Spiel kommt.
{W}: Sobald eine Quelle der bestimmten Farbe, die du bestimmst, dir das nächste Mal in diesem Zug Schaden zufügen würde, verhindere diesen Schaden.

foreignNames.name: Círculo de historias
foreignNames.text:
En cuanto el Círculo de historias entre en juego, elige un color.
{W}: La próxima vez que una fuente de tu elección del color elegido fuera a hacerte daño este turno, prevén ese daño.

foreignNames.name: Théâtre en cercle
foreignNames.text:
Au moment où le Théâtre en cercle arrive en jeu, choisissez une couleur.
{W} : La prochaine fois qu'une source de votre choix de la couleur choisie devrait vous blesser ce tour-ci, prévenez ces blessures.

foreignNames.name: Circolo della Storia
foreignNames.text:
Mentre il Circolo della Storia entra in gioco, scegli un colore.
{W}: La prossima volta che una fonte a tua scelta del colore scelto ti infliggerebbe danno in questo turno, previeni quel danno.

foreignNames.name: 物語の円
foreignNames.text:
物語の円が場に出るに際し、色を１色選ぶ。
{W}：このターン、あなたが選んだ、選ばれた色の発生源１つが次にあなたに与えるダメージをすべて軽減し、０にする。

foreignNames.name: Círculo de Histórias
foreignNames.text:
Conforme Círculo de Histórias entra em jogo, escolha uma cor.
{W}: Na próxima vez que uma fonte de sua escolha da cor escolhida fosse causar dano a você neste turno, previna aquele dano.

foreignNames.name: Круг Истории
foreignNames.text:
При входе Круга Истории в игру выберите цвет.
{W}: В следующий раз при нанесении вам повреждений в этом ходу от выбираемого вами источника выбранного цвета предотвратите эти повреждения.

foreignNames.name: 诵传仪典
foreignNames.text:
于诵传仪典进场时，选择一种颜色。
{W}：选择一个该色的伤害来源，于本回合中，防止该来源下一次将对你造成的伤害。

cards.originalText:
As Story Circle comes into play, choose a color.
{W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Stronghold Discipline
cards.text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature they control.
cards.flavor: In Urborg, the instigators of each new rebellion are soaked in the blood of the last.

foreignNames.name: Felsenburg-Disziplinierung
foreignNames.text: Jeder Spieler verliert 1 Lebenspunkt für jede Kreatur, die er kontrolliert.
foreignNames.flavor: In Urborg waten die Anstifter jeder neuen Rebellion im Blut der letzten.

foreignNames.name: Disciplina de la fortaleza
foreignNames.text: Cada jugador pierde 1 vida por cada criatura que controle.
foreignNames.flavor: En Urborg, los instigadores de cada nueva rebelión están impregnados de la sangre de la última.

foreignNames.name: Discipline de la forteresse
foreignNames.text: Chaque joueur perd 1 point de vie pour chaque créature qu'il contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: En Urborg, les instigateurs de chaque nouvelle rébellion sont baignés dans le sang de ceux de la précédente.

foreignNames.name: Disciplina della Fortezza
foreignNames.text: Ogni giocatore perde 1 punto vita per ogni creatura che controlla.
foreignNames.flavor: A Urborg, gli istigatori di ogni nuova ribellione vengono immersi nel sangue della precedente.

foreignNames.name: 要塞の規律
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーは、自分がコントロールするクリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: アーボーグでは、新たな反乱の扇動者は、最後には血の海に沈むことになっている。

foreignNames.name: Disciplina da Fortaleza
foreignNames.text: Cada jogador perde 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura que controle.
foreignNames.flavor: Em Urborg, os instigadores de cada nova rebelião são ensopados no sangue da anterior.

foreignNames.name: Стронгхолдская Дисциплина
foreignNames.text: Каждый игрок теряет 1 жизнь за каждое существо под своим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: В Урборге зачинщики каждого нового бунта обагряны кровью предыдущего.

foreignNames.name: 城塞纪律
foreignNames.text: 每位牌手各失去若干生命，其数量等同于他所操控之生物数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 在乌尔博格，每场叛乱的煽动者身上都沾满前次叛乱者的鲜血。

cards.originalText: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.

cards.name: Stun
cards.text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Fortunately, merfolk aren't used to opponents with feet."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

rulings.text: Must be used before blockers are declared in order to affect blocking decisions. You can’t wait to see what your opponent declares and then try to stop them.
You can use it after combat or even on a creature which can’t possibly block this turn because it’s that player’s turn to attack, but it generally has no effect other than to let you draw a card.

foreignNames.name: Betäubung
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht blocken.Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Zum Glück sind Meermänner nicht an Gegner mit Füßen gewöhnt." —Gerrard von der Wetterlicht

foreignNames.name: Aturdir
foreignNames.text:
La criatura objetivo no puede bloquear este turno.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Por suerte, los tritones no están acostumbrados a oponentes con pies." —Gerrard del Vientoligero

foreignNames.name: Étourdissement
foreignNames.text:
La créature ciblée ne peut pas bloquer ce tour-ci.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Heureusement, les ondins n'ont pas l'habitude de combattre des adversaires qui ont des pieds. » —Gerrard de l'Aquilon

foreignNames.name: Stordire
foreignNames.text:
Una creatura bersaglio non può bloccare in questo turno.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Per fortuna, i tritoni non sono abituati ad avversari con i piedi." —Gerrard della Cavalcavento

foreignNames.name: 気絶
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それではブロックできない。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: ありがたいことに、マーフォークは足のついてる敵と戦うのに慣れてないんだ。 ――ウェザーライト号のジェラード

foreignNames.name: Atordoar
foreignNames.text:
A criatura alvo não pode bloquear neste turno.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Felizmente, os tritões não estão acostumados a oponentes com dois pés." — Gerrard do Bons Ventos

foreignNames.name: Оглушение
foreignNames.text:
Целевое существо не может блокировать в этом ходу.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: "К счастью, мерфолки не привыкли к ходячим противникам". — Джерард с Везерлайта

foreignNames.name: 愣定
foreignNames.text:
目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「幸好，人鱼不太习惯有脚的对手。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

cards.originalText:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sudden Impact
cards.text: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."
—Dravus, lava mage

foreignNames.name: Plötzlicher Aufprall
foreignNames.text: Der Plötzliche Aufprall fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl an Karten auf seiner Hand zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Es gibt Leute, die sagen, man soll denken, bevor man handelt. Und während diese Leute alle Möglichkeiten bedenken, habe ich genug Zeit, sie zu töten." —Dravus, Lavamagier

foreignNames.name: Impacto súbito
foreignNames.text: El Impacto súbito hace una cantidad de daño igual al número de cartas que haya en la mano del jugador objetivo a ese jugador.
foreignNames.flavor: "Algunos dicen que es mejor pensar antes de actuar. Mientras esa gente considera las opciones, entonces es cuando las mato." —Dravus, mago de lava

foreignNames.name: Choc soudain
foreignNames.text: Le Choc soudain inflige au joueur ciblé un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de cartes dans la main de ce joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: « Certains disent qu'il vaut mieux réfléchir avant d'agir. Et c'est pendant que ces gens réfléchissent que je les tue. » —Dravus, mage des laves

foreignNames.name: Impatto Improvviso
foreignNames.text: L'Impatto Improvviso infligge danno a un giocatore bersaglio pari al numero di carte in mano a quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: "Alcuni dicono che sia meglio pensare prima di agire. E mentre considerano tutte le opzioni, io li uccido." —Dravus, mago della lava

foreignNames.name: 突然の衝撃
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。突然の衝撃はそのプレイヤーに、そのプレイヤーの手札のカードの枚数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 何かする前に考えた方がいいなんてやつもいるさ。 そいつらは全部の選択肢を考えてる間に――俺がそいつらを殺しちまうんだがな。 ――溶岩魔道士、ドレイヴァス

foreignNames.name: Impacto Súbito
foreignNames.text: Impacto Súbito causa ao jogador alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de cards na mão daquele jogador.
foreignNames.flavor: "Algumas pessoas dizem que é melhor pensar antes de agir. Enquanto essas pessoas estão considerando todas as opções, é quando normalmente eu as mato." — Dravus, mago da lava

foreignNames.name: Внезапный Удар
foreignNames.text: Внезапный Удар наносит целевому игроку столько повреждений, сколько карт находится в его руке.
foreignNames.flavor: "Некоторые полагают, что лучше сначала думать, а потом делать. Вот пока они обдумывают все возможности, я их обычно и убиваю". — Дравус, маг лавы

foreignNames.name: 猛然撞击
foreignNames.text: 猛然撞击对目标牌手造成等同于该牌手之手牌数量的伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有人认为先考虑再行动才稳当。 我拿下的人头通常都还在考虑各种应对之道。」 ～熔岩法师赭拉瓦

cards.originalText: Sudden Impact deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.

cards.name: Sulfurous Springs
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

foreignNames.name: Schwefelquellen
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B} oder {R}. Die Schwefelquellen fügen dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignNames.name: Manantiales sulfurosos
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R} a tu reserva de maná. Los Manantiales sulfurosos te hacen 1 punto de daño.

foreignNames.name: Sources sulfureuses
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R} à votre réserve. Les Sources sulfureuses vous infligent 1 blessure.

foreignNames.name: Sorgenti Sulfuree
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R} alla tua riserva di mana. Le Sorgenti Sulfuree ti infliggono 1 danno.

foreignNames.name: 硫黄泉
foreignNames.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{R}を加える。 硫黄泉はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: Fontes Sulfurosas
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R} à sua reserva de mana. Fontes Sulfurosas causa 1 ponto de dano a você.

foreignNames.name: Серные Источники
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.
{T}: Добавьте {B} или {R} в ваше хранилище маны. Серные Источники наносят вам 1 повреждение.

foreignNames.name: 硫磺温泉
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。 硫磺温泉对你造成1点伤害。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Sunken Hope
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"I don't concern myself with my enemy's hopes. Hopes follow the tides. They will retreat soon enough."
—Ambassador Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Versunkene Hoffnung
foreignNames.text: Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments jedes Spielers bringt dieser Spieler eine Kreatur, die er kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich kümmere mich nicht um die Hoffnungen meiner Gegner. Hoffnung verhält sich wie die Gezeiten. Und die Ebbe setzt bald ein." —Botschafter Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Esperanza hundida
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo del mantenimiento de cada jugador, ese jugador regresa una criatura que controle a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Yo no me preocupo con las esperanzas de mis enemigos. Las esperanzas se mueven con la marea. Pronto se retirarán." —Embajador Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Espoir englouti
foreignNames.text: Au début de l'entretien de chaque joueur, ce joueur renvoie une créature qu'il contrôle dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je me désintéresse des espoirs de mon ennemi. Les espoirs sont comme les marées. Ils finissent toujours par se retirer. » —L'ambassadeur Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Speranza Affondata
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del mantenimento di ogni giocatore, quel giocatore fa tornare una creatura che controlla in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non mi preoccupo delle speranze dei miei nemici. Le speranze seguono le maree. E ben presto si ritireranno." —Ambasciatore Laquatus

foreignNames.name: ついえし希望
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーのアップキープの開始時に、そのプレイヤーは自分がコントロールするクリーチャーを１体、オーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 敵の希望なんかには関心が無いね。 希望は波のようなものだ。 すぐに去ってしまうんだから。 ――ラクァタス大使

foreignNames.name: Esperança Submersa
foreignNames.text: No início da manutenção de cada jogador, aquele jogador devolve uma criatura que ele controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu não me preocupo com as esperanças de meus inimigos. As esperanças seguem as marés. Elas logo vão recuar." — Embaixador Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Потопленная Надежда
foreignNames.text: В начале шага поддержки каждого игрока тот игрок возвращает существо под своим контролем в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: "Меня не волнуют надежды и чаяния моих врагов. Надежды похожи на морской прилив. Они быстро отступают". — Посол Лакватус

foreignNames.name: 沉沦的希望
foreignNames.text: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手将一个由他操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我从不考虑对手有何期望。 期望随着浪潮涨落。 他们只会更快撤退。」 ～大使拉夸塔

cards.originalText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Suntail Hawk
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

foreignNames.name: Sonnenschwanz-Falke
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sein Auge ist wie die brennende Sonne, sein Ruf wie der scharfe Wind.

foreignNames.name: Halcón colasol
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: Su ojo es el sol deslumbrador, su grito es el viento cortante.

foreignNames.name: Faucon mordoré
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
foreignNames.flavor: Son regard a la radiance du soleil ; son cri, l'intensité du vent.

foreignNames.name: Falco Astrocoda
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il suo occhio è il sole abbagliante, il suo grido è il vento tagliente.

foreignNames.name: 陽光尾の鷹
foreignNames.text: 飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: その眼は輝く太陽、その叫びは身を切る風。

foreignNames.name: Falcão da Cauda Solar
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: Seu olho, o sol fulgurante; seu grito, o vento penetrante.

foreignNames.name: Солнечный Ястреб
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
foreignNames.flavor: Взор его яркое солнце, крик его воющий ветер.

foreignNames.name: 旭羽翔鹰
foreignNames.text: 飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
foreignNames.flavor: 目如炫日，鸣似寒风。

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Suntail Hawk
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

cards.name: Swamp
cards.originalText: B

cards.name: Swamp
cards.originalText: B

cards.name: Swamp
cards.originalText: B

cards.name: Swamp
cards.originalText: B

cards.name: Sylvan Basilisk
cards.text: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.
cards.flavor:
"We're not sure what one looks like, so to be safe, nobody look at anything until we're out of here."
—Parbold Drix, veteran explorer

foreignNames.name: Waldbasilisk
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Waldbasilisk von einer Kreatur geblockt wird, zerstöre diese Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir wissen nicht genau, wie er aussieht. Daher schaut niemand irgendetwas an, bis wir wieder aus dem Wald heraus sind." —Parbold Drix, erfahrener Erforscher

foreignNames.name: Basilisco silvano
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Basilisco silvano sea bloqueado por una criatura, destruye esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "No sabemos cómo son, así que, para estar seguros, nadie mire nada hasta que salgamos de aquí." —Parbold Drix, explorador veterano

foreignNames.name: Basilic sylvestre
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Basilic sylvestre devient bloqué par une créature, détruisez cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Nous ne savons pas à quoi il ressemble, alors au cas où, personne ne regarde rien avant qu'on sorte d'ici. » —Parbold Drix, explorateur vétéran

foreignNames.name: Basilisco Silvano
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Basilisco Silvano viene bloccato da una creatura, distruggi quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non siamo certi di quale sia il suo aspetto, quindi per stare al sicuro, nessuno guardi nulla fino a che non saremo fuori di qui." —Parbold Drix, esploratore veterano

foreignNames.name: 森のバジリスク
foreignNames.text: 森のバジリスクがいずれかのクリーチャーにブロックされるたび、そのクリーチャーを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: それがどんなだかはわからんが、安全のために、ここを離れるまで誰も何も見てはならん。 ――老練の探検家、パーボールド・ドリックス

foreignNames.name: Basilisco Silvestre
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Basilisco Silvestre for bloqueado por uma criatura, destrua aquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Não temos certeza da sua aparência, então, por segurança, ninguém olha para nada até sairmos daqui." — Parbold Drix, explorador veterano

foreignNames.name: Сильванский Василиск
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Сильванский Василиск блокируется существом, уничтожьте то существо.
foreignNames.flavor: "Мы не знаем, как он выглядит, поэтому, чтобы подстраховаться, никому ни на что не смотреть, пока мы отсюда не выберемся". — Парбольд Дрикс, опытный исследователь

foreignNames.name: 森林蜥怪
foreignNames.text: 每当森林蜥怪被生物阻挡时，消灭该生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们还不清楚他长什么样子，所以为安全起见，在走出去前谁都不准瞧任何东西。」 ～资深探险家帕博准

cards.originalText: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

cards.name: Sylvan Scrying
cards.text: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: One glimpse of an elf's home lasts her weeks away in the wild.

foreignNames.name: Wald-Hellseherei
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Länderkarte, zeige diese Karte offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein kurzer Blick auf seine Heimat genügt einem Elfen, um sich in der Wildnis noch wochenlang an sie zu erinnern.

foreignNames.name: Adivinación silvana
foreignNames.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: A un elfo le basta con vislumbrar su hogar para recordarlo durante semanas.

foreignNames.name: Regard sylvestre
foreignNames.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain, révélez-la et mettez-la dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Il suffit à un elfe d'apercevoir son foyer de loin, de temps à autre, pour se sentir chez lui.

foreignNames.name: Premonizione Silvana
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Le basta scorgere la casa di un elfo per stare settimane nelle zone più selvagge.

foreignNames.name: 森の占術
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーから土地カードを１枚探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加える。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 数週間前に一瞥しただけでも、故郷の景色はエルフの心に残り続ける。

foreignNames.name: Auspício Silvestre
foreignNames.text: Procure em seu grimório por um card de terreno, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Um relance do lar de um elfo lhe basta para suportar semanas na selva.

foreignNames.name: Сильванское Гадание
foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту земли, покажите ее и положите в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Один взгляд на родное жилище позволяет эльфу продержаться несколько недель на диких просторах.

foreignNames.name: 森林占卜
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张地牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 为了瞥一眼地精的房舍，她得在原野中待上好几周。

cards.originalText: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Tangle Spider
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: Only rumors have ever escaped its web.

foreignNames.name: Knäuelspinne
foreignNames.text:
Aufblitzen (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch zu jedem Zeitpunkt spielen, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber spielen könntest.)
Reichweite (Diese Kreatur kann fliegende Kreaturen blocken.)
foreignNames.flavor: Nur Gerüchte sind bislang ihrem Netz entkommen.

foreignNames.name: Araña de la Maraña
foreignNames.text:
Destello. (Puedes jugar este hechizo en cualquier momento en que pudieras jugar un instantáneo.)
Alcance. (Esta criatura puede bloquear criaturas con la habilidad de volar.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sólo los rumores pueden escapar a su telaraña.

foreignNames.name: Araignée de la Filandre
foreignNames.text:
Flash (Vous pouvez jouer ce sort à tout moment où vous pourriez jouer un éphémère.)
Portée (Cette créature peut bloquer les créatures avec le vol.)
foreignNames.flavor: Seules les rumeurs ont jamais échappé à sa toile.

foreignNames.name: Ragno del Groviglio
foreignNames.text:
Lampo (Puoi giocare questa magia in ogni momento in cui potresti giocare un istantaneo.)
Raggiungere (Questa creatura può bloccare le creature con volare.)
foreignNames.flavor: Le dicerie sono le uniche a essere mai sfuggite alla sua ragnatela.

foreignNames.name: 絡み森の蜘蛛
foreignNames.text:
瞬速 （あなたはこの呪文を、あなたがインスタントをプレイできるときならいつでもプレイしてよい。）
到達 （このクリーチャーは飛行を持つクリーチャーをブロックできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: その巣を逃れられるのは噂だけ。

foreignNames.name: Aranha do Emaranhado
foreignNames.text:
Lampejo (Você poderá jogar esta mágica a qualquer momento em que puder jogar uma mágica instantânea.)
Alcance (Esta criatura pode bloquear criaturas com a habilidade de voar.)
foreignNames.flavor: Os rumores foram as únicas coisas que já escaparam de sua teia.

foreignNames.name: Опутывающий Паук
foreignNames.text:
Миг (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание при любой возможности разыгрывать мгновенные заклинания.)
Захват (Это существо может блокировать существа с Полетом.)
foreignNames.flavor: Через его сети могут просочиться только слухи.

foreignNames.name: 铬铜林蜘蛛
foreignNames.text:
闪现（你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下使用此咒语。）
延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 只有传闻才能脱网而出。

cards.originalText:
Flash
Reach

cards.name: Tangle Spider
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: Only rumors have ever escaped its web.

cards.name: Telepathy
cards.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
cards.flavor:
"The question isn't whether I can read minds. It's whether I have yet to find a mind worth reading."
—Ambassador Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Telepathie
foreignNames.text: Alle deine Gegner spielen mit offenen Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Frage lautet nicht, ob ich Gedanken lesen kann. Sie lautet, ob ich noch einmal jemanden finde, bei dem es sich lohnt." —Botschafter Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Telepatía
foreignNames.text: Tus oponentes juegan mostrando sus manos.
foreignNames.flavor: "La pregunta no es si puedo leer mentes. Es más bien si he encontrado una mente que valga la pena leer." —Embajador Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Télépathie
foreignNames.text: Vos adversaires jouent avec leurs mains révélées.
foreignNames.flavor: « La question n'est pas de savoir si je peux lire les pensées, mais plutôt de savoir si je peux encore trouver des pensées dignes d'être lues. » —L'ambassadeur Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Telepatia
foreignNames.text: I tuoi avversari giocano con le loro mani rivelate.
foreignNames.flavor: "Il problema non è se posso leggere la mente. E' che ne devo ancora trovare una degna di essere letta." —Ambasciatore Laquatus

foreignNames.name: テレパシー
foreignNames.text: あなたの対戦相手は、手札を公開したままプレイする。
foreignNames.flavor: 問題は、私が考えを読めるかじゃない。 読むに値する考えにあたったことがあるかだ。 ――ラクァタス大使

foreignNames.name: Telepatia
foreignNames.text: Seus oponentes jogam com os cards de suas respectivas mãos revelados.
foreignNames.flavor: "A questão não é se eu posso ler mentes. E sim se eu ainda encontrarei uma mente que valha a pena ler." — Embaixador Laquatus

foreignNames.name: Телепатия
foreignNames.text: Ваши оппоненты играют с открытыми руками.
foreignNames.flavor: "Главное заключается не в том, умею ли я читать мысли, а в том, найду ли я когда-нибудь мысли, которые стоит читать". — Посол Лакватус

foreignNames.name: 心灵感应
foreignNames.text: 对手以展示手牌的方式进行游戏。
foreignNames.flavor: 「问题不在于我能否解读心灵， 而是我还没找到值得解读的。」 ～大使拉夸塔

cards.originalText: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

cards.name: Telling Time
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
cards.flavor: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

rulings.text: If there are fewer than three cards in your library, follow the instructions in the order given for any cards that are there.

foreignNames.name: Ausgenutzte Zeit
foreignNames.text: Schau dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine dieser Karten auf deine Hand und lege eine auf und eine unter deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Es ist meisterlich, wenn man der Zeit sagen kann, was sie tun soll.

foreignNames.name: Contar el tiempo
foreignNames.text: Mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de esas cartas en tu mano, una en la parte superior de tu biblioteca y una en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: La maestría se alcanza cuando "contar el tiempo" se convierte en "contarle al tiempo qué debe hacer".

foreignNames.name: Heure révélatrice
foreignNames.text: Regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez une de ces cartes dans votre main, une autre au-dessus de votre bibliothèque et la dernière au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: La maîtrise est atteinte quand « l'heure révélatrice » devient « l'heure révélatrice de ce qu'il faut faire. »

foreignNames.name: Predire il Tempo
foreignNames.text: Guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungi una di quelle carte alla tua mano, mettine una in cima al tuo grimorio e una in fondo al tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: La padronanza viene raggiunta quando si passa da "predire il tempo" a "controllare il tempo".

foreignNames.name: 時間の把握
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを見る。 そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に加え、１枚をあなたのライブラリーの一番上に置き、１枚をあなたのライブラリーの１番下に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「時間の把握」が「時間の掌握」になった時が熟達したと言える時だ。

foreignNames.name: Dizer as Horas
foreignNames.text: Olhe os três cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um desses cards em sua mão, um no topo de seu grimório e o outro no fundo de seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: A maestria é atingida quando "dizer as horas" se torna "dizer às horas o que fazer."

foreignNames.name: Предсказание Времени
foreignNames.text: Посмотрите три верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из тех карт в вашу руку, другую — на верх вашей библиотеки, а третью — в низ вашей библиотеки.
foreignNames.flavor: Достигнуть мастерства значит превратить "тогда" в "тогда сделать".

foreignNames.name: 显现未来
foreignNames.text: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。 将其中一张置于你手上，一张置于你牌库顶，另一张置于你牌库底。
foreignNames.flavor: 若能从「显现未来」进步到「命令未来去做什么」，就算是大功告成。

cards.originalText: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Tempest of Light
cards.text: Destroy all enchantments.
cards.flavor: "Let everything return to its true nature, so that destiny may takes its course."

foreignNames.name: Sturmwind des Lichts
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre alle Verzauberungen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Alles möge zu seiner wahren Natur zurückkehren, so dass das Schicksal seinen Lauf nehmen kann."

foreignNames.name: Tempestad de luz
foreignNames.text: Destruye todos los encantamientos.
foreignNames.flavor: "Deja que todo regrese a su verdadera naturaleza, para que el destino siga su curso."

foreignNames.name: Tourmente de lumière
foreignNames.text: Détruisez tous les enchantements.
foreignNames.flavor: « Que tout retrouve sa véritable nature, pour que la destinée suive son cours. »

foreignNames.name: Tempesta di Luce
foreignNames.text: Distruggi tutti gli incantesimi.
foreignNames.flavor: "Che tutto faccia ritorno alla propria natura, affinché il destino possa seguire il proprio corso."

foreignNames.name: 光の大嵐
foreignNames.text: すべてのエンチャントを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 運命の導きに従わすべく、すべてを真の姿に戻そう。

foreignNames.name: Tempestade de Luz
foreignNames.text: Destrua todos os encantamentos.
foreignNames.flavor: "Deixe tudo voltar a sua verdadeira natureza, para que o destino possa seguir seu curso."

foreignNames.name: Буря Света
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте все чары.
foreignNames.flavor: "Пусть все станет таким, каким его задумала природа, и тогда судьба вернется на круги своя".

foreignNames.name: 明光风暴
foreignNames.text: 消灭所有结界。
foreignNames.flavor: 「让万物回归本我，使天命运行无碍。」

cards.originalText: Destroy all enchantments.

cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

foreignNames.name: Immerändernde Weite
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Immerändernde Weite: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardländerkarte und bringe sie getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Zwei Schritte nach Norden führen dich in die ungewisse Zukunft, nach Süden in die unruhige Vergangenheit, nach Osten in den heutigen Tag und nach Westen in das große Durcheinander.

foreignNames.name: Expansión terramórfica
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar la Expansión terramórfica: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica y ponla en juego girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Haz dos pasos al norte hacia el futuro inestable, al sur hacia el pasado inquieto, al este hacia el presente o al oeste hacia lo desconocido.

foreignNames.name: Immensité terramorphe
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez l'Immensité terramorphe : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez-la en jeu engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Faites deux pas au nord dans l'avenir instable, au sud dans le passé agité, à l'est dans le présent ou à l'ouest dans le vaste inconnu.

foreignNames.name: Distesa Terramorfica
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica la Distesa Terramorfica: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base e mettila in gioco TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Fai due passi a nord nel futuro incerto, a sud nel passato inquieto, a est nel giorno attuale o a ovest nel grande ignoto.

foreignNames.name: 広漠なる変幻地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 広漠なる変幻地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地カードを１枚探し、それをタップ状態で場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 二歩北へ進めば不安定な未来、南へ進めば不穏な過去、東に進めば今日この日、西へ進めば偉大なる未知。

foreignNames.name: Vastidão Morfoterrena
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifique Vastidão Morfoterrena: Procure em seu grimório por um card de terreno básico e coloque-o em jogo virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Dê dois passos ao norte para o futuro incerto, ao sul para o passado inquieto, ao leste para o presente, ou ao oeste para o grande desconhecido.

foreignNames.name: Просторы Преображенных Земель
foreignNames.text: {T}, Пожертвуйте Просторы Преображенных Земель: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли и положите ее в игру повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Сделай два шага на север в необитаемое будущее, на юг в неупокоенное прошлое, на восток в настоящее или на запад в великое неизвестное.

foreignNames.name: 地塑旷野
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲地塑旷野：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 迈开两步，向北迈进动荡将来，向南则为无宁过往，向东步回眼下此刻，或向西踏入未知境地。

cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Terror
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

foreignNames.name: Terror
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine nichtschwarze Nichtartefaktkreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden.

foreignNames.name: Terror
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo que no sea negra o artefacto. No puede ser regenerada.

foreignNames.name: Terreur
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature non-artefact, non-noire ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée.

foreignNames.name: Terrore
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura non artefatto, non nera bersaglio. Non può essere rigenerata.

foreignNames.name: 恐怖
foreignNames.text: アーティファクトでも黒でもないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。 それは再生できない。

foreignNames.name: Terror
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo que não seja preta e nem artefato. Ela não pode ser regenerada.

foreignNames.name: Террор
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое неартефактное нечерное существо. Оно не может быть регенерировано.

foreignNames.name: 惊骇
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。 它不能重生。

cards.originalText: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: The Hive
cards.text: {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor:
"Their buzzing makes my bones hum from a mile away."
—Galenti, treasure hunter

foreignNames.name: Wespennest
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T}: Bringe einen 1/1 Insekten-Artefaktkreaturspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit namens Wespe ins Spiel. (Er kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie summen so laut, dass ich es schon aus einer Meile Entfernung in den Knochen spüre." —Galenti, Schatzsucherin

foreignNames.name: La colmena
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T}: Pon en juego una ficha de criatura artefacto Insecto 1/1 con la habilidad de volar llamada Avispa. (No puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Su zumbido hace que mis huesos vibren a un kilómetro de distancia." —Galenti, buscador de tesoros

foreignNames.name: L'Essaim
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T} : Mettez en jeu un jeton de créature-artefact 1/1 Insecte avec le vol appelée Guêpe. (Elle ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Son bourdonnement fait vibrer mes os à un mile de là. » —Galenti, chasseur de trésor

foreignNames.name: L'Alveare
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T}: Metti in gioco una pedina creatura artefatto Insetto 1/1 con volare chiamata Vespa. (Non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Il loro ronzio fa vibrare le mie ossa da chilometri di distanza." —Galenti, cacciatore di tesori

foreignNames.name: 蜂の巣
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T}：「ワスプ」という名前の飛行を持つ１/１の昆虫アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークンを１体場に出す。 （それは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 数マイル先からでも、羽音でこの骨が震えるね。 ――宝探しのガレンティ

foreignNames.name: A Colméia
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T}: Coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura artefato 1/1 do tipo Inseto com a habilidade de voar chamada Vespa. (Ela só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Seu zumbido faz meus ossos zunirem a quilômetros de distância." — Galenti, caçador de tesouros

foreignNames.name: Улей
foreignNames.text: {5}, {T}: Положите в игру одну фишку артефактного существа 1/1 Насекомое с Полетом и именем Оса. (Она может быть заблокирована только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
foreignNames.flavor: "От их жужжания у меня за версту кости гудят". — Галенти, кладоискатель

foreignNames.name: 蜂箱
foreignNames.text: {5}，{T}：将一个1/1，名称为黄蜂，具飞行异能的昆虫神器生物衍生物放置进场。 （只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「它们的嗡声让我在一哩之外都感到骨头震动。」 ～猎宝者盖蓝提

cards.originalText: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp into play.

cards.name: The Hive
cards.text: {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor:
"Their buzzing makes my bones hum from a mile away."
—Galenti, treasure hunter

cards.name: Thieving Magpie
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies collect jewels for theirs.

foreignNames.name: Diebische Elster
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
Immer wenn die Diebische Elster einem Gegner Schaden zufügt, ziehst du eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Andere Vögel sammeln Zweige für ihr Nest. Die Elstern bevorzugen dagegen Juwelen.

foreignNames.name: Urraca ladrona
foreignNames.text:
Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
Siempre que la Urraca ladrona haga daño a un oponente, robas una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Otras aves recolectan ramas para sus nidos. Las urracas roban joyas para los suyos.

foreignNames.name: Pie voleuse
foreignNames.text:
Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
À chaque fois que la Pie voleuse inflige des blessures à un adversaire, vous piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Les autres oiseaux cherchent des brindilles pour leurs nids. La pie préfère les joyaux.

foreignNames.name: Gazza Ladra
foreignNames.text:
Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
Ogniqualvolta la Gazza Ladra infligge danno a un avversario, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli altri uccelli raccolgono ramoscelli per costruire i loro nidi. Le gazze collezionano gioielli per adornare i propri.

foreignNames.name: 泥棒カササギ
foreignNames.text:
飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
泥棒カササギが対戦相手１人にダメージを与えるたび、あなたはカードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 他の鳥は巣を作るために小枝を集める。 カササギは巣を作るために宝石を盗むんだ。

foreignNames.name: Gralha Larápia
foreignNames.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
Toda vez que Gralha Larápia causa dano a um oponente, você compra um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Os outros pássaros coletam gravetos para seus ninhos. As gralhas coletam jóias para os delas.

foreignNames.name: Сорока-Воровка
foreignNames.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
Каждый раз, когда Сорока-Воровка наносит оппоненту повреждения, вы берете карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Обычные птицы несут в гнездо веточки. Сороки же в гнездо несут драгоценности.

foreignNames.name: 窃鹊
foreignNames.text:
飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
每当窃鹊向对手造成伤害时，你抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 一般鸟儿收集细枝筑巢， 鹊则是收集宝石来筑巢。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card.

cards.name: Thieving Magpie
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies collect jewels for theirs.

cards.name: Threaten
cards.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Goblins' motivational techniques are crude, but effective.

foreignNames.name: Bedrohen
foreignNames.text: Enttappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl und übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über sie. Diese Kreatur erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Sie kann in diesem Zug angreifen und {T}.)
foreignNames.flavor: Die Motivationskünste der Goblins sind plump, aber effektiv.

foreignNames.name: Amenazar
foreignNames.text: Endereza la criatura objetivo y gana el control de ella hasta el final del turno. Esa criatura gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno. (Puede atacar y {T} este turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Las técnicas motivadoras de los trasgos son rudimentarias, pero efectivas.

foreignNames.name: Menace
foreignNames.text: Dégagez la créature ciblée et acquérez-en le contrôle jusqu'à la fin du tour. Cette créature acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elle peut attaquer et {T} ce tour-ci.)
foreignNames.flavor: Les stages de motivation chez les gobelins sont rudimentaires, mais efficaces.

foreignNames.name: Minacciare
foreignNames.text: STAPpa una creatura bersaglio e prendine il controllo fino alla fine del turno. Quella creatura ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno. (Può attaccare e {T} in questo turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Le tecniche motivazionali dei Goblin sono un po' rozze, ma efficaci.

foreignNames.name: 脅しつけ
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１対を対象とし、それをアンタップする。あなたはターン終了時までそれのコントロールを得る。 それはターン終了時まで速攻を得る。 （このターン、それは攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: ゴブリン式のやる気をおこさせる方法は、乱暴だが効果的だ。

foreignNames.name: Ameaçar
foreignNames.text: Desvire a criatura alvo e ganhe o controle dela até o final do turno. Aquela criatura ganha ímpeto até o final do turno. (Ela pode atacar e {T} neste turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: As técnicas para motivação utilizadas pelos goblins são imaturas, porém eficazes.

foreignNames.name: Угроза
foreignNames.text: Разверните целевое существо и получите контроль над ним до конца хода. То существо получает Ускорение до конца хода. (Оно может атаковать и {T} в этом ходу.)
foreignNames.flavor: Способ убеждения у гоблинов жестокий, но действенный.

foreignNames.name: 恐吓
foreignNames.text: 重置目标生物并获得其操控权直到回合结束。 该生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 （它此回合便能攻击与{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 精灵激励行动的技巧粗糙却有效。

cards.originalText: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Threaten
cards.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Goblins' motivational techniques are crude, but effective.

cards.name: Thrull Surgeon
cards.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor: "Just take a little off the top."

foreignNames.name: Thrullchirurg
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, opfere den Thrullchirurg: Schau dir die Karten auf der Hand eines Spielers deiner Wahl an und bestimme eine Karte davon. Dieser Spieler wirft diese Karte ab. Spiele diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei spielen könntest.
foreignNames.flavor: „Nur oben ein wenig kürzer."

foreignNames.name: Cirujano thrull
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, sacrificar el Cirujano thrull: Mira la mano del jugador objetivo y elige una carta de ahí. Ese jugador descarta esa carta. Juega esta habilidad sólo cuando puedas jugar un conjuro.
foreignNames.flavor: "Córtale sólo un poco de la parte de arriba."

foreignNames.name: Chirurgien srâne
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, sacrifiez le Chirurgien srâne : Regardez la main du joueur ciblé et choisissez-y une carte. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte. Ne jouez cette capacité que lorsque vous pourriez jouer un rituel.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je prendrai juste une petite tranche. »

foreignNames.name: Chirurgo Thrull
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifica il Chirurgo Thrull: Guarda la mano di un giocatore bersaglio e scegli una carta da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta. Gioca questa abilità solo quando potresti giocare una stregoneria.
foreignNames.flavor: "Basta toglierne un po' dalla punta."

foreignNames.name: スラルの外科医
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, スラルの外科医を生け贄に捧げる：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーの手札を見て、その中からカードを１枚選ぶ。 そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。この能力は、あなたがソーサリーをプレイできるときにしかプレイできない。
foreignNames.flavor: 端っこをちょっと取るだけにしてくださいよね。

foreignNames.name: Cirurgião Thrull
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifique Cirurgião Thrull: Olhe a mão do jogador alvo e escolha um card dela. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card. Jogue esta habilidade somente quando puder jogar um feitiço.
foreignNames.flavor: "Tire apenas uma parte do topo."

foreignNames.name: Трулл-Хирург
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, Пожертвуйте Трулла-Хирурга: Посмотрите в руку целевого игрока и выберите из нее карту. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту. Разыгрывайте эту способность только при возможности разыгрывать волшебство.
foreignNames.flavor: "Надо только чуть-чуть подровнять".

foreignNames.name: 医士索尔兽
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}，牺牲医士索尔兽：检视目标牌手的手牌并选择其中一张。 该牌手弃掉该牌。你只可以于你能使用法术的时机下使用此异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「只要把上面拿掉一点。」

cards.originalText: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

cards.name: Thundering Giant
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

foreignNames.name: Donnerriese
foreignNames.text: Eile (Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Den Riesen konnte man einige Sekunden lang schon spüren, bevor er in Sicht kam.

foreignNames.name: Gigante descomunal
foreignNames.text: Prisa. (Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entre bajo tu control.)
foreignNames.flavor: El gigante era percibido unos pocos segundos antes de ser visto.

foreignNames.name: Géant fulminant

cards.name: Time Stop
cards.text: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

rulings.text: Exiling a spell or ability prevents that spell or ability from resolving, but it doesn’t technically “counter” anything. This means that Time Stop can exile spells and abilities that “can’t be countered.”

Unless Time Stop is cast during the Ending phase, any “at the beginning of the end step”-triggered abilities don’t get the chance to trigger on the turn Time Stop is cast. These abilities will trigger at the beginning of the next end step.

Ending the turn this way means the following things happen in order: 1) All spells and abilities on the stack are exiled. This includes Time Stop, though it will continue to resolve. It also includes spells and abilities that can’t be countered. 2) All attacking and blocking creatures are removed from combat. 3) State-based actions are checked. No player gets priority, and no triggered abilities are put onto the stack. 4) The current phase and/or step ends. The game skips straight to the cleanup step. The cleanup step happens in its entirety.

If any triggered abilities do trigger during this process, they’re put onto the stack during the cleanup step. If this happens, players will have a chance to cast spells and activate abilities, then there will be another cleanup step before the turn finally ends.

Schaden wird abgetragen, und „in-diesem-Zug"- und „bis-zum-Ende-des Zuges"-Effekte enden.)

cards.name: Treetop Village
cards.text:
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

Activating the ability that turns it into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to a specific number. However, any effect that raises or lowers power and/or toughness (such as the effect created by Giant Growth, Glorious Anthem, or a +1/+1 counter) will continue to apply.

cards.name: Twincast
cards.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor: Imitation is the most dangerous form of flattery.

rulings.text: Twincast copies any text spliced onto the targeted spell, but you can’t splice additional text onto the copy.
You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs paid for the targeted spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too.

If the copy says that it affects “you,” it affects the controller of the copy, not the controller of the original spell. Similarly, if the copy says that it affects an “opponent,” it affects an opponent of the copy’s controller, not an opponent of the original spell’s controller.
If the spell Twincast copies is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell Twincast copies has an X whose value was determined as it was cast (like Earthquake does), the copy has the same value of X.
Twincast can target (and copy) any instant or sorcery spell, not just one with targets. It doesn’t matter who controls it.

As Twincast resolves, it creates a copy of a spell. That copy is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger. The copy will then resolve like a normal spell, after players get a chance to cast spells and activate abilities.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can’t choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).

foreignNames.flavor: 放っておけば、自然はあらゆる器からあふれ、あらゆる制限を倒し、あらゆる境界を越える。

foreignNames.name: Força Verdejante
foreignNames.text: No início de cada manutenção, coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura verde 1/1 do tipo Saprófita sob seu controle.
foreignNames.flavor: Se deixada em paz, a natureza transborda qualquer recipiente, derrota qualquer restrição e ultrapassa qualquer limite.

foreignNames.name: Зеленая Сила
foreignNames.text: В начале каждого шага поддержки положите в игру под вашим контролем одну фишку существа 1/1 зеленый Сапролинг.
foreignNames.flavor: Предоставленная сама себе, природа перетекает через все края, свергает все ограничения и пересекает любые границы.

foreignNames.name: 新绿使者
foreignNames.text: 在每个维持开始时，将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物在你的操控下放置进场。
foreignNames.flavor: 若让大自然恣意而行，必将盈满任何容器，挣脱任何限制，漫出任何疆域。

cards.originalText: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play under your control.

cards.name: Viashino Runner
cards.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"It moved this way, an' that way, an' then before I could stick it, it jumped over my head an' was gone."
—Jula, goblin raider

foreignNames.name: Viashino-Läufer
foreignNames.text: Der Viashino-Läufer kann nicht von weniger als zwei Kreaturen geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: „Erst gings nach hier, dann gings nach da, un' bevor ichs pieksen konnte, wars weg." —Jula, Goblinräuber

foreignNames.name: Mensajero viashino
foreignNames.text: El Mensajero viashino no puede ser bloqueado excepto por dos o más criaturas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Se movió hacia aquí y hacia allá, y luego, antes de que pudiera ensartarlo, saltó por encima de mi cabeza y desapareció." —Jula, incursora trasgo

foreignNames.name: Coureur viashino
foreignNames.text: Le Coureur viashino ne peut pas être bloqué excepté par deux créatures ou plus.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il est passé par ici, et il est r'passé par là. Et avant que j'puisse le bâtonner, il est passé par d'ssus ma tête et s'est envolé. » —Djulä, pillarde gobeline

foreignNames.name: Corridore Viashino
foreignNames.text: Il Corridore Viashino non può essere bloccato tranne che da due o più creature.
foreignNames.flavor: "Si è spostato di qua, e poi di là, e prima che potessi infilzarlo, mi è saltato sulla testa ed è sparito." —Jula, predone goblin

foreignNames.name: ヴィーアシーノの飛脚
foreignNames.text: ヴィーアシーノの飛脚は、２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: こっちいって、あっちいって、飛びつこうと思ったら、その前に頭を飛び越えられてどっかいった。 ――ゴブリンの略奪者ジュラ

foreignNames.name: Velocista Viashino
foreignNames.text: Velocista Viashino só pode ser bloqueado por duas ou mais criaturas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ele se moveu para lá e para cá, e então, antes que eu pudesse atingi-lo, ele pulou por sobre a minha cabeça e sumiu." — Jula, goblin salteador

foreignNames.name: Гонец Виашино
foreignNames.text: Гонец Виашино не может быть заблокирован менее чем двумя существами.
foreignNames.flavor: "Он сначала туды, потом сюды, а потом я его даже зацепить не успел, как он перепрыгнул через меня и был таков". — Джула, нападающий гоблин

foreignNames.name: 凡尔西诺亡命者
foreignNames.text: 凡尔西诺亡命者只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他先这样动，然后那样动，然后我要刺他的时候，他跳过我头上，然后就不见了。」 ～精灵突击员珠拉

cards.originalText: Viashino Runner can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

cards.name: Viashino Sandscout
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandscout to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

rulings.text: It is returned to its owner’s hand at the end of turn only if it is on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Viashino-Sandspäher
foreignNames.text:
Eile (Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
Bringe am Ende des Zuges den Viashino-Sandspäher auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück. (Bringe ihn nur zurück, falls er im Spiel ist.)
foreignNames.flavor: Die sich überlappenden Schuppen der Viashinos bilden ein Polster gegen die heißen Winde Shivs und sorgen dafür, dass die Speere der Goblins eher abrutschen.

foreignNames.name: Explorador de arena viashino
foreignNames.text:
Prisa. (Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entre bajo tu control.)
Al final del turno, regresa el Explorador de arena viashino a la mano de su propietario. (Regrésalo sólo si está en juego.)
foreignNames.flavor: Las escamas superpuestas de los viashino forman una defensa contra los vientos cenicientos de Shiv, y son un blanco resbaladizo para las lanzas de los trasgos.

foreignNames.name: Éclaireur des sables viashino
foreignNames.text:
Célérité (Cette créature peut attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elle arrive sous votre contrôle.)
À la fin du tour, renvoyez l'Éclaireur des sables viashino dans la main de son propriétaire. (Renvoyez-la seulement si elle est en jeu.)
foreignNames.flavor: Les écailles superposées du viashino le protègent contre les vents cendreux de Shiv et le rendent glissant pour les piques des gobelins.

foreignNames.name: Scout delle Sabbie Viashino
foreignNames.text:
Rapidità (Questa creatura può attaccare e {T} non appena entra sotto il tuo controllo.)
Alla fine del turno, fai tornare lo Scout delle Sabbie Viashino in mano al suo proprietario. (Fallo tornare in mano solo se è in gioco.)
foreignNames.flavor: Le scaglie sovrapposte di un viashino lo proteggono dai venti carichi di cenere di Shiv e sono un bersaglio scivoloso per le picche dei goblin.

foreignNames.name: ヴィーアシーノの砂漠の斥候
foreignNames.text:
速攻 （このクリーチャーは、あなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
ターン終了時に、ヴィーアシーノの砂漠の斥候をオーナーの手札に戻す。 （場にある場合にのみ戻す。）
foreignNames.flavor: ヴィーアシーノの重なった鱗は、シヴの灰混じりの風をやわらげ、ゴブリンの矛を滑りやすくする。

foreignNames.name: Batedor das Areias Viashino
foreignNames.text:
Ímpeto (Esta criatura pode atacar e {T} assim que entra sob seu controle.)
No final do turno, devolva Batedor das Areias Viashino para a mão de seu dono. (Devolva-a apenas se ela estiver em jogo.)
foreignNames.flavor: As escamas sobrepostas de um viashino formam uma barreira contra os ventos cinzentos de Shiv e um alvo escorregadio para as lanças dos goblins.

foreignNames.name: Песчаный Разведчик Виашино
foreignNames.text:
Ускорение (Это существо может атаковать и {T}, как только оно попадает под ваш контроль.)
В конце хода верните Песчаного Разведчика Виашино в руку его владельца. (Верните его, только если он в игре.)
foreignNames.flavor: Плотная чешуя виашино надежно защищает от пепельных шиванских ветров и представляет собой чересчур скользкую мишень для копий гоблинов.

foreignNames.name: 凡尔西诺沙探
foreignNames.text:
敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）
在回合结束时，将凡尔西诺沙探移回其拥有者手上。 （若它在场，才将其移回手上。）
foreignNames.flavor: 凡尔西诺重叠的鳞片能构成缓冲，可抵挡西瓦满布灰烬的强风，并滑开精灵矛尖。

cards.name: Viridian Shaman
cards.text: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor: She stands as a living symbol of the natural world and an enemy of the forces that threaten it.

foreignNames.name: Viridischer Schamane

foreignNames.flavor: Die Schamanen symbolisieren die natürliche Welt und leben als Feinde der Kräfte, die die Welt bedrohen.

foreignNames.name: Chamán viridiana

foreignNames.flavor: Ella se alza como un símbolo viviente del mundo natural y como un enemigo de las fuerzas que lo amenazan.

foreignNames.name: Shamane viridiane
foreignNames.text: Quand la Shamane viridiane arrive en jeu, détruisez l'artefact ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: Elle est le symbole vivant du monde de la nature et l'ennemie des forces qui la menacent.

foreignNames.name: Sciamana Viridiana
foreignNames.text: Quando la Sciamana Viridiana entra in gioco, distruggi un artefatto bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: E' il simbolo vivente del mondo naturale e il nemico delle forze che lo minacciano.

foreignNames.name: ヴィリジアンのシャーマン
foreignNames.text: ヴィリジアンのシャーマンが場に出たとき、アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼女の姿は、自然の世界の生ける象徴であり、それを脅かす物に対しては敵と映る。

foreignNames.name: Xamã Viridiana
foreignNames.text: Quando Xamã Viridiana entrar em jogo, destrua o artefato alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Ela é um símbolo vivo do mundo natural e uma inimiga para as forças que a ameaçam.

foreignNames.name: Виридийский Шаман
foreignNames.text: Когда Виридийский Шаман входит в игру, уничтожьте целевой артефакт.
foreignNames.flavor: Она является живым символом мира природы и врагом всех сил, угрожающих ему.

foreignNames.name: 暗碧族祭师

foreignNames.flavor: 对自然世界而言，她是个鲜活象征；对自然之敌而言，她是位难缠对手。

foreignNames.name: Voce Omnia

foreignNames.name: Porta-voz

cards.name: Warp World
cards.text: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

rulings.text: Anything that triggers during the resolution of this will wait to be put on the stack until everything is put onto the battlefield and resolution is complete. The player whose turn it is will put all of their triggered abilities on the stack in any order, then each other player in turn order will do the same. (The last ability put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.)

Taking it slowly, here's what happens when Warp World resolves: 1) Each player counts the number of permanents they own. 2) Each player shuffles those permanents into their library. 3) Each player reveals cards from the top of their library equal to the number that player counted. 4) Each player puts all artifact, land, and creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. All of these cards enter the battlefield at the same time. 5) Each player puts all enchantment cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way can enchant an artifact, land, or creature that was already put onto the battlefield, but can't enchant an enchantment that's being put onto the battlefield at the same time as it. If multiple players have Auras to put onto the battlefield, the player whose turn it is announces what their Auras will enchant, then each other player in turn order does the same, then all enchantments (both Auras and non-Auras) enter the battlefield at the same time. 6) Each player puts all of their other revealed cards (instants, sorceries, planeswalkers, and Auras that can't enchant anything) on the bottom of their library in any order.

Tokens are permanents but not cards. They’ll count toward the number of permanents shuffled into your library, so you’ll get a card back for each token you owned. But the tokens themselves should be ignored while you’re revealing *cards* from your library. In practice, you shouldn’t actually shuffle them into your library since they’ll cease to exist as soon as Warp World finishes resolving. Note that a token’s owner is the player under whose control it first entered the battlefield.
